card.name: Abomination of Gudul
Abzan Ascendancy
card.text: When Abzan Ascendancy enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Abzan Banner
card.text: {T}: Add {W}, {B}, or {G} to your mana pool. {W}{B}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Abzan Banner: Draw a card.

card.name: Abzan Battle Priest
card.text: Outlast {W} Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has lifelink.

card.name: Abzan Charm
card.text: Choose one - - Exile target creature with power 3 or greater. - You draw two cards and you lose 2 life. - Distribute two +1/+1 counters among one or two target creatures.

card.name: Abzan Falconer
card.text: Outlast {W} Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has flying.

card.name: Abzan Guide
card.text: Lifelink Morph {2}{W}{B}{G}

card.name: Act of Treason
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.text: Outlast {1}{W} Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has first strike.

card.name: Alabaster Kirin
card.text: Flying, vigilance

card.name: Altar of the Brood
card.text: Whenever another permanent enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Anafenza, the Foremost
card.text: Whenever Anafenza, the Foremost attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on another target tapped creature you control. If a creature card would be put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

card.name: Ankle Shanker
card.text: Haste Whenever Ankle Shanker attacks, creatures you control gain first strike and deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: Arc Lightning
card.text: Arc Lightning deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures and/or players.

card.name: Archers' Parapet
card.text: Defender {1}{B}, {T}: Each opponent loses 1 life.

card.name: Armament Corps
card.text: When Armament Corps enters the battlefield, distribute two +1/+1 counters among one or two target creatures you control.

card.name: Arrow Storm
card.text: Arrow Storm deals 4 damage to target creature or player. Raid - If you attacked with a creature this turn, instead Arrow Storm deals 5 damage to that creature or player and the damage can't be prevented.

card.name: Ashcloud Phoenix
card.text: Flying When Ashcloud Phoenix dies, return it to the battlefield face down under your control. Morph {4}{R}{R} When Ashcloud Phoenix is turned face up, it deals 2 damage to each player.

card.name: Avalanche Tusker
card.text: Whenever Avalanche Tusker attacks, target creature defending player controls blocks it this combat if able.

card.name: Awaken the Bear
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Barrage of Boulders
card.text: Barrage of Boulders deals 1 damage to each creature you don't control. Ferocious - If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, creatures can't block this turn.

card.name: Bear's Companion
card.text: When Bear's Companion enters the battlefield, put a 4/4 green Bear creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Become Immense
card.text: Delve Target creature gets +6/+6 until end of turn.

card.name: Bellowing Saddlebrute
card.text: Raid - When Bellowing Saddlebrute enters the battlefield, you lose 4 life unless you attacked with a creature this turn.

card.name: Bitter Revelation
card.text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. You lose 2 life.

card.name: Blinding Spray
card.text: Creatures your opponents control get -4/-0 until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Bloodfell Caves
card.text: Bloodfell Caves enters the battlefield tapped. When Bloodfell Caves enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Bloodfire Mentor
card.text: {2}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Bloodsoaked Champion
card.text: Bloodsoaked Champion can't block. Raid - {1}{B}: Return Bloodsoaked Champion from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only if you attacked with a creature this turn.

card.name: Blossoming Sands
card.text: Blossoming Sands enters the battlefield tapped. When Blossoming Sands enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.

card.text: Creatures you control have vigilance. Each creature you control can block an additional creature.

card.name: Briber's Purse
card.text: Briber's Purse enters the battlefield with X gem counters on it. {1}, {T}, Remove a gem counter from Briber's Purse: Target creature can't attack or block this turn.

card.name: Bring Low
card.text: Bring Low deals 3 damage to target creature. If that creature has a +1/+1 counter on it, Bring Low deals 5 damage to it instead.

card.name: Burn Away
card.text: Burn Away deals 6 damage to target creature. When that creature dies this turn, exile all cards from its controller's graveyard.

card.name: Sultai Ascendancy
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top two cards of your library. Put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest back on top of your library in any order.

card.name: Sultai Banner
card.text: {T}: Add {B}, {G}, or {U} to your mana pool. {B}{G}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Sultai Banner: Draw a card.

card.name: Sultai Charm
card.text: Choose one - - Destroy target monocolored creature. - Destroy target artifact or enchantment. - Draw two cards, then discard a card.

card.name: Sultai Flayer
card.text: Whenever a creature you control with toughness 4 or greater dies, you gain 4 life.

card.name: Sultai Soothsayer
card.text: When Sultai Soothsayer enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Surrak Dragonclaw
card.text: Flash Surrak Dragonclaw can't be countered. Creature spells you control can't be countered. Other creatures you control have trample.

card.name: Suspension Field
card.text: When Suspension Field enters the battlefield, you may exile target creature with toughness 3 or greater until Suspension Field leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Swarm of Bloodflies
card.text: Flying Swarm of Bloodflies enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Swarm of Bloodflies.

card.name: Swift Kick
card.text: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn. It fights target creature you don't control.

card.name: Swiftwater Cliffs
card.text: Swiftwater Cliffs enters the battlefield tapped. When Swiftwater Cliffs enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Taigam's Scheming
card.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. Put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest back on top of your library in any order.

card.name: Take Up Arms
card.text: Put three 1/1 white Warrior creature tokens onto the battlefield.

card.name: Temur Ascendancy
card.text: Creatures you control have haste. Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card.

card.name: Temur Banner
card.text: {T}: Add {G}, {U}, or {R} to your mana pool. {G}{U}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Temur Banner: Draw a card.

card.name: Temur Charger
card.text: Morph-Reveal a green card in your hand. When Temur Charger is turned face up, target creature gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Temur Charm
card.text: Choose one - - Target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. It fights target creature you don't control. - Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}. - Creatures with power 3 or less can't block this turn.

card.name: Thornwood Falls
card.text: Thornwood Falls enters the battlefield tapped. When Thornwood Falls enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Thousand Winds
Throttle
card.text: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.

card.name: Timely Hordemate
card.text: Raid - When Timely Hordemate enters the battlefield, if you attacked with a creature this turn, return target creature card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Tomb of the Spirit Dragon
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {2}, {T}: You gain 1 life for each colorless creature you control.

card.name: Tormenting Voice
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Tormenting Voice, discard a card. Draw two cards.

card.name: Trail of Mystery
card.text: Whenever a face-down creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. Whenever a permanent you control is turned face up, if it's a creature, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Tranquil Cove
card.text: Tranquil Cove enters the battlefield tapped. When Tranquil Cove enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Trap Essence
card.text: Counter target creature spell. Put two +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature.

card.name: Treasure Cruise
card.text: Delve Draw three cards.

card.name: Trumpet Blast
card.text: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Tuskguard Captain
card.text: Outlast {G} Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.

card.name: Ugin's Nexus
card.text: If a player would begin an extra turn, that player skips that turn instead. If Ugin's Nexus would be put into a graveyard from the battlefield, instead exile it and take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Unyielding Krumar
card.text: {1}{W}: Unyielding Krumar gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Utter End
card.text: Exile target nonland permanent.

card.name: Valley Dasher
card.text: Haste Valley Dasher attacks each turn if able.

card.name: Villainous Wealth
card.text: Target opponent exiles the top X cards of his or her library. You may cast any number of nonland cards with converted mana cost X or less from among them without paying their mana costs.

card.name: War Behemoth
card.text: Morph {4}{W}

card.name: War-Name Aspirant
card.text: Raid - War-Name Aspirant enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked with a creature this turn. War-Name Aspirant can't be blocked by creatures with power 1 or less.

card.name: Warden of the Eye
card.text: When Warden of the Eye enters the battlefield, return target noncreature, nonland card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Watcher of the Roost
card.text: Flying Morph-Reveal a white card in your hand. When Watcher of the Roost is turned face up, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Waterwhirl
card.text: Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands.

card.name: Weave Fate
card.text: Draw two cards.

card.name: Wind-Scarred Crag
card.text: Wind-Scarred Crag enters the battlefield tapped. When Wind-Scarred Crag enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Windstorm
card.text: Windstorm deals X damage to each creature with flying.

card.name: Windswept Heath
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Windswept Heath: Search your library for a Forest or Plains card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Wingmate Roc
card.text: Flying Raid - When Wingmate Roc enters the battlefield, if you attacked with a creature this turn, put a 3/4 white Bird creature token with flying onto the battlefield. Whenever Wingmate Roc attacks, you gain 1 life for each attacking creature.

card.name: Winterflame
card.text: Choose one or both - - Tap target creature. - Winterflame deals 2 damage to target creature.

card.name: Witness of the Ages
card.text: Morph {5}

card.name: Wooded Foothills
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Wooded Foothills: Search your library for a Mountain or Forest card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Woolly Loxodon
card.text: Morph {5}{G}

card.name: Zurgo Helmsmasher
card.text: Haste Zurgo Helmsmasher attacks each combat if able. Zurgo Helmsmasher has indestructible as long as it's your turn. Whenever a creature dealt damage by Zurgo Helmsmasher this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Zurgo Helmsmasher.
